entry.title: What's new in GoCD

author.name: Aravind S.V, Product Manager at GoCD

entry.content: GoCD has released several new features recently. Here's an overview of what you can look forward to using.

entry.title: Remediation Strategy for Continuous Delivery of Microservices
entry.content: In this post, we'll look at remediation strategies when there's instability or bugs.

entry.title: Replacing GoCD with GoCD
entry.content: GoCD has made major changes recently, and if you haven't tried it lately, you haven't tried it at all.

entry.title: Configuration Strategy for Continuous Delivery of Microservices
entry.content: In this post, we'll look at three considerations for your microservices configuration strategy.

entry.title: Improving GoCD through usage analytics
entry.content: GoCD started collecting and analyzing usage data in 18.7. This post explains the data collected and how to turn it off.

entry.title: How to Work with Materials in GoCD
entry.content: Learn more about how to use materials in GoCD, including understanding more about blacklisting and whitelisting

entry.title: Configuration Strategy for Continuous Delivery of Microservices
entry.content: This post talks about the best ways to manage your configurations for continuous delivery of a microservices setup.

entry.title: Environment Strategy for Continuous Delivery of Microservices
entry.content: In this post, we'll look at environment strategy including artifact promotion and leveraging modern infrastructure for dynamic environments.

entry.title: Continuous Delivery of Microservices - Trunk Based Development and Feature Toggles
entry.content: Getting deeper into CD practices, we'll cover continuous integration, feature toggles, and the importance of trunk based development

entry.title: Test Strategy for Microservices
entry.content: In the second post of this blog series, we will dig deeper into testing strategies for a microservices architecture..
